page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: The village is fortunate in having a large playing field owned by the Parish Council on which there is a slide, swings and a climbing frame for the younger children. It also has running lanes, rounders and football pitches. The fooball club play in the Telford sunday league and have a very successful team. The village primary school also has a football team, which takes part in friendly 5 a side matches and local tournaments. The girls in the school take part in friendly netball matches and tournaments. The Grove comprehensive school in Market Drayton organise annual football and netball tournaments for the primary school children. The school also have use of the use of the playing field as there is no grassed area at the school.
